text: Two emissaries from the Laotian Government of Prince Boun Oum have arrived in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, to invite Prince Souvanna Phouma, the former Prime Minister, to return to Laos. No details of their mission have been disclosed, but it was reported earlier in Laos that Prince Boun Oum was considering asking Prince Souvanna Phouma to join his Government.
